item.title: Rogue Planets - What are they Really?
item.description: “As a kid, I would count backwards from ten and imagine at one, there would be an explosionâ€”perhaps caused by a rogue planet crashing into Earth or some other major catastrophe.” -Lang Leav

item.title: Should we all be using Signal?
item.description: _“There are two types of encryption: one that will prevent your sister from reading your diary and one that will prevent your government.” -Bruce Schneier”

item.title: About Us
item.description: This is the e-magazine of QuizInc, the offical quizzing club of NIT Durgapur. The website is powered by Hugo and is hosted on GitHub Pages. Like what you see? Contact us on our official social platforms or drop us an e-mail and we’ll get back to you!
